title: A Very Bookish Thanksgiving
description: Erin Moore struggles when her new employer asks her to teach his grandchildren about the holiday…Analise Marshell might soon not belong anywhere at all…Jeremy searches for refuge…Pippa has the perfect opportunity to write a novel…Essie March pursues her dreams but everything seems in her way……all at Thanksgiving. Join Kelsey Bryant (inspired by Jane Eyre), Sarah Holman (inspired by Mansfield Park), Rebekah Jones (inspired by Peter Pan), J. Grace Pennington (inspired by Great Expectations), and Amanda Tero (inspired by Little Women) as they share stories of gratitude, faith, and hope.
author: Sarah Holman
